com.raouf.android.muff.Fragments

Class SearchFragment

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.support.v4.app.Fragment
      • com.raouf.android.muff.Fragments.SearchFragment
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    android.content.ComponentCallbacks, android.view.View.OnCreateContextMenuListener

    public class SearchFragment
extends android.support.v4.app.Fragment
    Search screen. - Offers the capability to search for movies using omdbapi through Search. - shows results in a list in a RecyclerView.

    • Nested Class Summary
